title: Heavy Bowgun: Brain Freeze
altText: An entry for the Original Weapon and Pendant Design Contest in Monster Hunter Wilds, featuring a Heavy Bowgun shaped like an ice cream cone with three scoops, with the upgraded version being topped with several sprinkles, candy pieces, chocolate drizzle, and whipped cream. In the bottom left is a drawing of a Palico enjoying an ice cream cone.
caption: This was an entry for the Original Weapon and Pendant Design Contest in Monster Hunter Wilds! It didn't make it past the first round, but I had a lot of fun designing this! I have but a simple desire to wield a Heavy Bowgun that is silly and nonsensical! (The Palico drawing in the bottom left was drawn by Sam!)

title: Let's Go Hunting!
altText: Three fan characters for Monster Hunter Wilds. Connie the Hunter is riding on top of Gilgamesh the Seikret, while Socks the Palico is holding onto Gilgamesh's tail.
caption:
Monster Hunter Wilds has taken over my life, and I couldn't be happier! This was originally going to be on the splash page, but oops, I made it way too detailed! Here are some details about the hunting group here:
  • Connie: Heavy Bowgun user. Currently wearing the Rompololo armor while in the Forbidden Lands. Born and raised in a rider village, but took a different career path in hunting later down the line.
  • Socks: Melynx Palico. Very strict about abiding to safety regulations and always has Connie chug an Armordrug before setting out on a hunt.
  • Gilgamesh: Seikret steed for Connie. Huge troublemaker, no one knows if Connie controls him or if it's the other way around.

title: Halloween 2023
altText: Jibansam as the Cheshire Cat (left), Kaybee as Alice (middle), and Whisper as the White Rabbit (left) in the setting of "Alice in Wonderland". Both Jibansam and Whisper are glaring in each other while Kaybee is nervously eating a pumpkin-shaped cookie that reads, "Eat Me". The cursive text above them reads, "Happy Halloween!"
caption: Happy Spoopy Day! üç¨üéÉ\n\nI was thinking about Yokai Watch again, and I wanted to draw these three. :3

title: Lock-jawed and Loaded
altText: Rayman in his LockJaw costume from Rayman 3. There is a Chain Chomp attached to the end of his chain.
caption: I missed Rayman's birthday, but I had to draw something for one of my childhood heroes! The LockJaw costume doesn't appear in the DLC, but how cool would it be to have a Chain Chomp attached at the end?\n\nHappy belated birthday, Rayman! Here's to a new game, hopefully! üéÇ

title: Dede-divergent
altText: A comic with human designs of King Dedede and a Waddle Dee. The Waddle Dee is asking King Dedede if he's figured out why he has some issues with seemingly easy tasks, to which the king reveals he did and found out he has ADHD.
caption: We appreciate a neurodivergent king! This was inspired by this Twitter thread:\n\n![A screenshot of a Twitter thread. The original tweet has a screenshot from the Kirby anime with an X-Ray of King Dedede. The subtitles read, "Dedede had a traumatic childhood, and it negatively impacted his attention span." The original poster's text reads, "You can't just drop this line and not elaborate on it, what the hell happened???" Another Twitter user replies to the tweet with, "He has ADHDedede".](/assets/images/art/game/202308adhdedede_1.png)

title: The Nose Knows?
altText: A two-part image of Ganondorf and Linebeck set in the Super Smash Bros universe. Ganondorf is sitting on a rock with Linebeck looking at him in the eyes. Linebeck is wearing two party hats: one on his head and one over his nose. In the second part of the image, Linebeck gets closer to Ganondorf until his party-hat nose touches the latter's nose. Linebeck says nothing but "boop", causing the Gerudo's face to turn red.
caption: -twirls hair- I'm so normal for these two.

title: Yokai Watchers
altText: A reference of Whisper, Jibansam, and Kaybee as they appear in an alternate universe of Yokai Watch. The text around Whisper reads as follows: "450+ years old. Unofficial Yokai butler. Kaybee's first friend in years. Cooks and cleans when Kaybee is at work. Coattail always slightly moving." The text around Kaybee reads: "30 years. Developer at Springdale Tech. Kind of a loner. Loves bug catching. Had her sweater since high school." The text around Jibansam reads: "??? years. Definitely a real cat. Kaybee's roommate. Mostly lounges around Kaybee's apartment. Drawstrings somehow still act like tails."
caption: I wanted to add a self-insert into Yokai Watch, but I ended up making an entire AU oops.\n\nAlso, a friend chart for giggles! ![A friend chart of Kaybee's, Jibansam's, and Whisper's relationships with one another. The arrow from Kaybee to Whisper says, "Has a massive crush". The arrow from Whisper to Kaybee says, "Loves her a lot...as a friend!" The two-sided arrow between Kaybee and Jibansam says, "Best friends!" The two sided-arrow between Jibansam and Whisper says, "FRENEMIES"](/assets/images/artwork/game/202305yokaiwatchers_friendchart.jpg)

title: Face Reveal
altText: A comic strip that consists of four panels. In the first panel, a hunter is asking Kagero why he wears a mask. Another hunter (Sam) steps in and tells the hunter to let the man be ugly in peace. Later, when Kagero's face is revealed, Sam is visibly shocked and blushing at how handsome he is.
caption: I never thought we'd ever see Kagero's face reveal! Man, Sunbreak is so good! (Starring Sam's hunter OC!)

title: Care for a Cup?
altText: A recreation of a scene from Looney Tunes except Bugs Bunny is wearing Rathalos armor and Pete Puma is replaced by a Teostra. Bugs asks Teostra how many lumps he'd like. Teostra answers wanting about 3 or 4, to which Bugs replies with several hits to Teostra's head with a hammer.
caption: "It's still a monster, so its head must be a weak point!"\n\nI only seem to put effort into backgrounds if it's for a meme. xD Oh well, at least I had fun with this one!
transcript: Bugs Bunny: "How many lumps do you want?"\n\nTeostra: "Oh, uh...three or four."

title: "We've Won the Boss Rush..."
altText: A recreation of a Seinfeld meme but instead replacing Costanza holding a baseball batt with King Dedede holding his signature hammer.
caption: "...in six fights."\n\nIf you know the meme, you know the meme! Had a lot of fun with this one! I even tried to crop it at the original aspect ratio lmao

title: A Dedede-lightful Plan
altText: A human version of King Dedede from the Kirby game series diabolically plotting a birthday party for Kirby. He is holding a whitebord with his left hand and a marker topped with a star decoration in his right hand.
caption: I still wholeheartedly believe that Dedede has become like a father figure to Kirby (and the Waddle Dees), but I love making maniacal expressions for the self-made king of Dreamland!
transcript: King Dedede: "This'll be the best party for Kirby, I know it!"\n\nKing Dedede: "There'll be so many presents...and fireworks...Lots and LOTS OF FIREWORKS!!!

title: Ugly Twin
altText: Emmet (left) and Ingo (right) from the Pokemon game franchise enjoying breakfast together.
caption: Ever since the revelation that Ingo (and by extension, Emmet) have receding hairlines, I had to recreate a joke that Sam told me years ago! I think they look great and whoever gives them full heads of hair are either ignorant or cowards! xDD
transcript: Emmet: "Hey, Ingo, how's it feel being the ugly twin?"\n\nIngo: "Emmet, we're *identical* twins. We look the same."

title: Merry Christmas 2021
altText: Bright and Mr. Merry (Mew gijinkas) in warm clothing. They are holding hands and pressing their cheeks together. The banner beneath them reads, "May your days be MERRY and BRIGHT"
caption: How befitting that Bright and Mr. Merry's names are in the song, "White Christmas"! This was not intentional on mine or Sam's parts lol. It was a happy coincidence!

title: deltarune: SUITE ROUTE
altText: Noelle and Spamton from deltarune in a snowstorm. Noelle is carrying Spamton who is unconscious.
caption: The cover for my unfinished fanfic of the Suite Route, an alternate route where Noelle is the one who meets Spamton in the dumpster! I'm not sure if I'll ever finish this fanfic since, well, chapters 3 and 4 released, but it was fun while it lasted! A lot of people really enjoyed it!

title: Kiss, Kiss, Fall in Love!
altText: Lea (Serious Handler) giving Aiden (Excitable A-Lister) tugging on his cloak and giving him a kiss on the lips. Aiden is visibly surprised but excited about the kiss nonetheless.
caption: A piece dedicated to my sweetest Sam! It's Aiden and Lea, the best pair in Monster Hunter: World! ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ I put in so many hours into making this one look super nice! It was a lot of fun

title: Cutting Edge
altText: A filled meme template called the "Shirt Cut Meme" with various drawings of an alive Sir Daniel Fortescue. Each shirt cut is as follows: sideboob, inner sideboob, boob window, underboob, and free space.
caption: Lots of artists provided wonderful fanservice with this meme! So, I decided to provide some "fandisservice" by drawing a certain hero of Gallowmere (in the flesh). B)

title: Hero of Gallowmere
altText: A marker drawing of Sir Daniel Fortesque sitting on a tombstone.
caption: I don't use my Copic markers enough, but I really enjoyed working on this! I worked on this on and off during my work breaks!

title: IT'S FRIDAY NIGHT WITH KING DEDEDE
altText: A recreation of an image made by kisekisymphony (Twitter) for the parody account ItDedede that posts every Friday night at 8PM EST, replacing King Dedede with a human version of King Dedede.
caption: Dedicated to my favorite Twitter account [@itdedede](https://twitter.com/itdedede)!
